name: UIGraphicsRendererContext
desc: The base class for the drawing environments for graphics renderers.

items.name: var format: UIGraphicsRendererFormat
items.desc: The format used to create the associated graphics renderer.

items.name: func stroke(CGRect)
items.desc: Paints a rectangular path using the currently selected stroke color.

items.name: func stroke(CGRect, blendMode: CGBlendMode)
items.desc: Paints a rectangular path using the currently selected stroke color and specified blend mode.

items.name: func fill(CGRect, blendMode: CGBlendMode)
items.desc: Paints a rectangular area with the currently selected fill color using the supplied blend mode.

items.name: func fill(CGRect)
items.desc: Paints a rectangular area with the currently selected fill color.

items.name: func clip(to: CGRect)
items.desc: Sets the clipping mask for the drawing context to the specified rectangle.
